author: leosimons
msg: several major changes. Made tweety into an avalon component itself, so it isn't limited from being run through the main() method. Also added quite a bit of documentation and logging output and fixed a few bugs.
Still need to update javadocs to reference the actual documentation and figure out what todo (see @todo) with configurable and contexualizable components.
